item.title: [SUREFIRE-2231] JaCoCo 0.8.11 fails with old TestNG releases on Java 17+
item.description:
Upgrade JaCoCo to 0.8.11 and watch many TestNGs ITs fail. A lot still use TestNG 5.7 which seems to be broken with Java 17+. We either need to remove them or upgrade the entire test setup to 6+ which should work on Java 17+ as well:
